org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.reservation.planning

Class StageEarliestStartByDemand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.reservation.planning.StageEarliestStartByDemand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StageEarliestStart

    public class StageEarliestStartByDemand
extends Object
implements StageEarliestStart
    Sets the earliest start time of a stage proportional to the job weight. The interval [jobArrival, stageDeadline) is divided as follows. First, each stage is guaranteed at least its requested duration. Then, the stage receives a fraction of the remaining time. The fraction is calculated as the ratio between the weight (total requested resources) of the stage and the total weight of all proceeding stages.

        Description copied from interface: StageEarliestStart
        Computes the earliest allowed starting time for a given stage.
        Specified by:
        setEarliestStartTime in interface StageEarliestStart
        Parameters:
        plan - the Plan to which the reservation must be fitted
        reservation - the job contract
        index - the index of the stage in the job contract
        current - the stage
        stageDeadline - the deadline of the stage set by the two phase planning algorithm
        Returns:
        the earliest allowed starting time for the stage.
